REC_POINT_01_02: ̄A security controlled elevator. This is a highly classified elevator, for only certain personnel.

NPC_RENATE_SPEED_MSG_010: ̂Wow, look at what was left behind. I'm shocked to say the least. ā Well then,　ȁ。 This is for you. ā I... live with constant regret. ā Even though I was able to free you from your prison, I did so without regard to the robots living there. ā Yes, they were Dark Master's Servants, but they did their own part in caring for your well-being. ā So, I want you to have this.
NPC_RENATE_SPEED_MSG_030: ̂I'll leave it to you to make things right...
NPC_RENATE_SPEED_MSG_040: ̂Well, it seems as if Aroma has left behind this giant arena. ā Always the showy one, that Aroma...
NPC_CITIZEN_MAN_B_SPEED_MSG_010: ́My, how my blood and bones tingle with excitement! I'm overwelmed with nostalgia! ā Such attention to detail! Even though we are underground, we have skies of blue above, just like the arena back at home.
RESISTANCE_WOMAN_B_SPEED_MSG_010: ̂Aroma arranged the preparations for us to rebuild this arena a while back. ā It took a lot longer than expected, but i'm glad we were able to finish it without incident.
